content: Which 19th-century author penned the classic novels 'War and Peace' and 'Anna Karenina'?

The 19th-century author who penned the classic novels 'War and Peace' and 'Anna Karenina' is Leo Tolstoy. He was a Russian writer who is widely regarded as one of the greatest novelists of all time. His works explore complex moral and philosophical issues and are known for their psychological depth and realistic portrayals of characters and society.
